short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Benmi.com Whois Lookup(Context Menu version), you can select the domain name directly in Chrome directly in the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This version for English language.The finally website's language will be English.
Benmi.com's whois extension can select the text the to support recognition benmi.com's WHOIS listed .com /.net/.org/.biz/.cc/.co/.info/.tv /com.cn /cn. More than 120 kinds of domain name suffixes, including China. Networks. companies such as IDN domain name

(1) identify the methods of operation of the plaintext URL address:
Directly select the URL address can be in plain text.

(2) identify the hyperlink top-level domain methods of operation:
Right-click (select text) directly to the hyperlink can.

(3) identify the selected title, the method of operation of the domain name in the content:
Include multiple domain names when the selected text, the default will be to identify the first domain name, if you want to identify the second domain, the beginning of the selected text recognition domain name you want.

(4) direct identification of the top-level domain mailbox methods of operation:
Method 1: you can directly select the the mailbox main domain name.
Method 2: Select the entire mailbox, so the top-level domain name system automatically recognizes the mailbox.
